name: Intercom
description:
A laboratory assistant finds himself alone and blind in an abandoned laboratory that was once his home. His only hope of escape is you, and your only means of communication is an intercom that can only produce a single tone.

Controls:

  • Press Space to Beep

Made for the 2019 Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam.

Author's note: There's much more I had planned for this entry that I sadly couldn't get to due to lost time. What's here is a small, shallow demo that hopefully gets the basic concept across. Thanks for trying it out!
